messages.message: Who would be the best person to talk to about a real-time document validation use-case?
I can help on the real-time aspect. For document validation capabilities it would be helpful to get input from a solution engineer. cc: @Kerry @Balaram
CapOne wants to discuss how the use-case would work tomorrow on a call.  Would love to understand a bit more about feasibility before then.
(and this is building off Jamie’s fireside chat on kickoff yesterday)

Ah ok, so on the high level, we have a “fast” flow run mode that does not save files to the disk, so we save some IO time. I don’t think there’s much else to understand. 

@wadams , for your call tomorrow I think you don’t need to include engineers. What will be useful to know is
What’s “real-time” requirement for them (like how much time they require the data to return) 
What’s the document they want to process, on average how many pages are in a doc, do the docs need OCR
What’s the data they want to extract from a document 

Basically what’s the input and output for their use case, and what’s the time requirement
perfect!  thanks, Kerry!  exactly the context i need!
